name: Cat & Potat: Cat Attack!
description:
Cat & Potat! Is finally here!

Potat is the name of this handsome Veggie! He lives up on the hills of Veggie-Ville!

He likes to walk around his garden and enjoy the warm sunlight!

(even if it makes his skin peel)

One day when Potat was out on his usual stroll...

CATS started to fall from the sky!

He quickly realized he could not stand still or they would probably EAT HIM!

He had to MOVE!

Potat now finds himself in the most EPIC situation of his tiny life!

How long can he survive the CAT ATTACK!?

A hand-drawn game by Simon Bergström @twitter.com/CaveCatGames

With music by Viktor Granström @www.viktorgranström.com

And Valdemar Delding @www.valdemardelding.com
